'''A Little Less Shocking Than Love at First Sight''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Elemental Specialist: Series I]]''. The achievements are earned by defeating 4 opponents with [[Electro-Charged]] within two seconds.

==Achievements==
{{Achievements by Category Table|A Little Less Shocking Than Love at First Sight}}
<!--
==Notes==
-->
==Trivia==
* The name of the achievement is part of a quote that [[Lisa]] says during the Archon Quest ''[[Sparks Amongst the Pages]]'': "The electrical discharge caused by friction is only a little less shocking than love at first sight."
